<head>
  <script src="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js"></script>
  <script>
    function onSubmit(token) {
      var form = document.getElementById('contact-form');
      var formData = new FormData(form);
      fetch(form.action, {
        method: form.method,
        body: formData,
        headers: {
          'Accept': 'application/json'
        }
      }).then(function(response) {
        if (response.ok) {
          return response.json();
        } else {
          return Promise.reject(response);
        }
      }).then(function(data) {
        showMessage('Your message was sent successfully!', 'success');
        form.reset();
      }).catch(function(error) {
        showMessage('There was a problem sending your message.', 'error');
      });
    }
      // Show successful message sent to user
    function showMessage(text, type) {
      var messageDiv = document.getElementById('message-confirmation');
      messageDiv.innerText = text;
      messageDiv.style.display = 'block';
      messageDiv.style.borderColor = type === 'success' ? 'green' : 'red';
      setTimeout(function() {
        messageDiv.style.display = 'none';
      }, 4000); // 5 seconds
    }
    // Clicking on the email icon focuses on the Full Name input field
    function highlightContainer(event) {
      event.preventDefault();  // Prevent the default action of the anchor tag
      var fullNameInput = document.getElementById('full-name');
      fullNameInput.focus();  // Focus on the Full Name input field
    }
  </script>
</head>

::: {.g-col-6 #form}
<!-- The form is always visible -->
<form action="https://formspree.io/f/mblryjnj" method="POST" accept-charset="utf-8" id="contact-form">
  <label class="label-full-name" for="full-name">Full Name</label>
  <input type="text" name="name" id="full-name" class="form-control" placeholder="First and Last" required>
  <label class="label-email-address" for="email-address">Email Address</label>
  <input type="email" name="_replyto" id="email-address" class="form-control" placeholder="your@email.here" required>
  <label class="label-message" for="message">Message</label>
  <textarea rows="6" name="message" id="message" class="form-control" placeholder="Type your message" required></textarea>
  <button class="g-recaptcha submit-button" data-sitekey="6LfGXSEqAAAAAHUUzb2ahGJ5v0wsubCZW37Hgglg" data-callback='onSubmit' data-action='submit'>Submit</button>
</form>
<div id="message-confirmation"></div>
